colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I YANG SRID MCHOG SPRUL DVANGS GSAL NGES RNYED BYUNG 'PHRAL, KHU RAL T'A BLA MA BLO BZANG YE SHES, GSOL DPON KARMA SKYABS, DZA' SANG TSE RING DON GRUB BCAS GANG GI ZHABS 'BRANGS PA RNAMS NAS BRTAN BZHUGS GSOL 'DEBS SMON TSIG ZHES BSKUL BA DANG, RANG NYID KYANG MOS PA'I 'TSAMS SBYAR TE, SH'AKYA'I RING LUGS 'DZIN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MKHYEN RAB 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO STE, MING GZHAN TA LA'I BLA MA BADZRA DHA RAR 'BOD PAS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,LEGS SO, ,)
